greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 6: repeat [0, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3].
formula: a(n) = (11 - 5*cos(n*Pi/3) - 5*cos(2*n*Pi/3) - cos(n*Pi) - 3*sqrt(3)*sin(n*Pi/3) - sqrt(3)*sin(2*n*Pi/3))/6. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 04 2018
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 03 2018
